include_count.desc: Include the number of users in the User Group.

team_id.desc: Encoded team id where the user group is, required if org token is used.

usergroup.desc: The encoded ID of the User Group to enable.

errors.permission_denied: The user does not have permission to enables the User Group.
errors.plan_upgrade_required: This workspace does not have access to User Groups, as that feature is only available on Standard and above plans.
